definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Section 3. Cardholders are required to comply with this Code of Practice.
sentences.chinese: 第三條持卡人須遵守本守則。

sentences.english: Self realizes that he recognizes one of the guys in the grainy still image.
sentences.chinese: 在模糊的靜止圖像中，賽爾夫認出了其中一個持卡人。

sentences.english: The creditors could sue or place a lien on a cardholder’s house.
sentences.chinese: 債權人可以上訴或者扣押持卡人的房子。

sentences.english: Cardholders must retum the redemption form within the month applicable to each item in order to enjoy the special offer.
sentences.chinese: 持卡人須於適當的月份交回此表格方可享此優惠。

sentences.english: Michael records all 6 cardholders on cell phone video.
sentences.chinese: 邁可用手機拍下了所有6個持卡人影像。

sentences.english: Will call tickets must be picked up by card holder.
sentences.chinese: 只有持卡人才能領取預售票。

sentences.english: The cardholders ' act of obtaining and using affinity card indicates their support to the affinity entities.
sentences.chinese: 持卡人領用認同卡表示對認同單位事業的支持。

sentences.english: Are any WLANs connected to your cardholder data environment?
sentences.chinese: 是否有無線網絡連接到持卡人數據環境？

sentences.english: The card owner should present the card at the Hotel when consuming.
sentences.chinese: 持卡人在消費時，請向酒店出示聖德至尊會員卡。

sentences.english: Is there a current cardholder data process flow diagram?
sentences.chinese: 是否有當前持卡人數據處理的流程圖？

sentences.english: Many card holders who don't know their limits get into debts over their heads.
sentences.chinese: 許多持卡人自不量力，讓卡債逼上絕路。

sentences.english: Our Hospital will help the card-holders to complete the complex claim process.
sentences.chinese: 本院會協助持卡人完成繁瑣的理賠程序。

sentences.english: Scylla is actually made up of six cards being held by different people.
sentences.chinese: “錫拉”其實是六張卡，由六個不同的持卡人持有。

sentences.english: VIP card holders can enjoy special discount or services at certain stores.
sentences.chinese: 貴賓卡持卡人可以在指定商店享受特定折扣或服務。

definition: to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
to withdraw money from a bank
to report the loss of something
